  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111283</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pomagaj medvedku najti pot</string>
            <string language="en">Help the bear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helfen Sie dem Bären</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aidez l'ours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajude ao urso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aiuti l'orso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοηθήστε την αρκούδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayude al oso</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Najdi pot skozi labirint, ki medveda pripelje do brloga.</string>
            <string language="en">Help the bear to find its way through the labyrinth to get to the lair.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">labirint</string>
            <string language="en">labyrinth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">medved</string>
            <string language="en">bear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pot</string>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helfen Sie dem Bären, seine Methode durch das 
Labyrinth zu finden, zum Lager zu kommen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aidez l'ours à trouver son chemin par le 
labyrinthe d'arriver à la tanière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajude ao urso encontrar sua maneira através do 
labirinto começar ao lair.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aiuti l'orso a trovare il relativo modo 
attraverso il labirinto ottenere al lair.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοηθήστε την αρκούδα για να βρείτε τον τρόπο του μέσω
του λαβύρινθου να φτάσει στη φωλιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayude al oso a encontrar su manera a través del 
laberinto de conseguir a la guarida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Labyrinth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bär</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">labyrinthe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voie d'accès</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">labirinto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">urso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trajeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">labirinto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percorso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λαβύρινθος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντέξτε</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονοπάτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">laberinto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">camino</string>
          </keyword>
